message:
Guys, any idea how to push notification (PhoneGap) with Parse 
i Post on this URL https://api.parse.com/1/push and JSON object { "channels": ["Broadcast"],
"data": { "title":"test", "alert": "test" } }

It works if the app is running on the background, need to fix this to work if the app is closed? any ideas?
name: https://api.parse.com/1/push
caption: api.parse.com

data.message: I don't thik you can push notifications if you app is not running in the background. one thing you can do is to make a background worker to check for the json file searching for new messages.
Actually you can, i did that just not with PhoneGap

Once your app is installed and established a connection with Apple Push APIs or Google Push APIs you will be able to do that when the app is offline, in fact this is the primary goal of push notifications.
yes but how you app is gonna send notification if it's not working :D or in the background ?
good question :) I was after pushing notification from the server to the app so that works.
